sys_atf_test.description:
Validate the existance of tables and menus in the ATAT scoped application. Step 1: Create a user to impersonate Steps 2-3: Validate existence of ATAT application and the Acquisition Package and Contacts tables for the user Steps 4-5: Validate the user ability to navigate to view and create an Acquisition Package Steps 6-8: Create records used to then create a parent Acquisition Package record Steps 9-10: Validate fields of the created Acquisition Package record Steps 11-13: Create and validate fields of a Contact record Steps 14-16: Create and validate fields of a many-to-many relationship between the created Acq Package and Contact reocords
Note: admin is the applied role for the moment until ACL for the defined roles are set.
sys_atf_test.name: Verify ATAT tables & menus (AT-7105)
